text: Slaugherhouse-Five is a 1972 American science fiction comedy movie directed by George Roy Hill and based on the novel of the same name by Kurt Vonnegut. It stars Michael Sacks, Ron Leibman, Eugene Roche, Valerie Perrine, Kevin Conway, Roberts Blossom and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1972 science fiction movies Category:1972 comedy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by George Roy Hill Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Slaughterhouse-Five (movie)
